Reviews.Title: This kit is all you need to take high quality photographs.
Reviews.Author: dan b
Reviews.Content: This camera/kit is a really good value for a high quality product.  So far we have purchased six of these to use in a law enforcement environment to photograph crime scenes.  The camera is durable and the backpack helps to prevent our officers from damaging or breaking it.  It captures high quality clear crisp images with the standard lens as well as the zoon lens.  Manual adjustments make it possible to take perfect shots in almose any lighting condition. The 32gig card and battery allows for storage of hundreds of images without having to recharge or use an additional card.This was an excellent purchase.
